channel.title: In Case You Missed It (Law)
channel.itunes:author: ICYMI Law dot com
channel.itunes:summary: A daily digest of law-themed happenings in the fediverse, including most-shared links and the SSRN paper of the day.

description.content: Welcome to today's news roundup. We start off with a story about the importance of representation in the judiciary. This follows the portrait ceremony of Judge Robert L. Wilkins, who was appointed to the U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit. We'll also look at how the COVID-19 pandemic has opened up opportunities for Americans with disabilities in the job market. Finally, we'll review the résumé of Rep.-elect George Santos (R-NY), which is being called into question. Be sure to stay tuned for all the details. View the Digest/Primary Sources
